ParkMate (NZ)

Explore hassle-free parking across New Zealand with ParkMate, the app that simplifies your parking experience with a touch of convenience and innovative technology.

üìå Core Features:

  • Search Convenience: Easily locate car parks near your intended destination üìç.
  • Pay-as-you-go: Start and stop your parking sessions as needed, with the option to extend time via the app üî≤.
  • Reminder Alerts: Get notifications for active sessions or upcoming expirations ‚è∞.
  • Favourites: Save and quickly access your preferred car parks or sessions üëç.
  • Bundle Savings: Enjoy discounts on parking with promotional codes and bundle deals üí∞.
  • Digital Monitoring: Go ticketless with digital tracking for peace of mind üì±.
  • Transaction History: Track your parking history and resend receipts conveniently üßæ.
  • Contactless Service: Stay safe with a fully contactless parking solution üõ°Ô∏è.

üëç Pros:

üëé Cons:

üíµ Price:

  • ParkMate is free to download and offers in-app purchases for parking sessions and bundle promos. The price of parking sessions and bundles varies depending on location and promotions üÜì+üí≥.

ParkMate is your go-to app for smart parking in New Zealand, offering a robust set of features that cater to both individual and corporate needs, ensuring you a seamless and cost-effective parking experience.
